entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 3.
